name: 葛瑞斐
objective:
本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
Through class discussion and group presentations, this course will help develop students’ English conversation skills. In the course of practicing such skills, we will take as our general topic the issue of art and creativity. Our topics will include: favorite artists; storytelling and personal creativity; self-portraiture and self-discovery.
